tgt_original: adya prabhṛti dāso'haṃ samarpita mayā tava || 14 ||

samarpiteti nirvibhatikam || 14 ||  evaṃ vidhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā sādhakena suniścitaḥ |  tatastasya tuṣyanti ḍākinyo yogamātarāḥ || 15 ||  evamityādinā pṛṣṭhapūraṇamāha - anantaroktaḥ suvarṇādidānavidhiḥ sādhakena suṣṭhu niścitaḥ śobhanatvena svīkṛto'numodita ityarthaḥ |
ḍākinyo lāmayaścaiva khaṇḍarohā tu rupiṇī |  etairvicarejjagatvasarvaṃ ḍākinyaiḥ saha sādhakaḥ || 16 ||
